description: Manages global parameters of NetStream on HUAWEI CloudEngine switches.

statistics_record.description: Specifies the flexible netstream statistic record, length is 1 - 32.

sampler_interval.description: Specifies the netstream sampler interval, length is 1 - 65535.

state.description: Specify desired state of the resource.

type.description: Specifies the type of netstream global.
